shop.models module

class shop.models.Beer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

A Django model representing a beer product object.

Parameters:

  • beer_name (str) – Name of the beer, up to 50 characters.

  • abv (float) – Alcohol by volume percentage of the beer.

  • ibu (int) – International Bitterness Units of the beer.

  • style (str) – Style of the beer, up to 100 characters.

  • price (int, optional) – Price of the beer in Rands.

  • desc (str, optional) – Description of the beer.

  • image (str, optional) – Image of the beer.

Returns:

A Beer object.

Return type:

Beer

Methods:

__str__(self): Returns the name of the beer as a string.

image

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.
